data.name: Immortal Realms: Vampire Wars Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Return to Nemire and enjoy the captivating and intense atmosphere of conflict among the mist-shrouded lands of the Dracul, the forsaken realms of the Nosfernus and the ice-covered plains of the Moroia. The original score for Immortal Realms: Vampire Wars is composed and produced by Mats Lundgren and features the following songs:
data.about_the_game: Return to Nemire and enjoy the captivating and intense atmosphere of conflict among the mist-shrouded lands of the Dracul, the forsaken realms of the Nosfernus and the ice-covered plains of the Moroia. The original score for Immortal Realms: Vampire Wars is composed and produced by Mats Lundgren and features the following songs:
data.short_description: The original score for Immortal Realms: Vampire Wars features 27 songs composed and produced by Mats Lundgren.
